one of which has the "Team Synchronizing" perspective as single perspective.

The code that is NPEing was added in 3.1 when we fixed the global action 
support.

Created an attachment (id=14440)
Fix

This should fix it. The problem lies in the order of calls to the dispose()
method hierarchy. I changed it to do the call at the beginning of the
overriding method, although cleaning up a superclass before the subclass seems
a bit odd. But apparently that's the way ActionGroup works.
